bibl.title: with contributions by Sebastian Brock, Richard M. Price and Kevin Van Bladel, History and Historiography from the Late Antique Sinai.
bibl.note: Includes selections from three papyri from Nessana in the Negev.
bibl.seg: Caner Daniel F., with contributions by Sebastian Brock, Richard M. Price and Kevin Van Bladel, History and Historiography from the Late Antique Sinai. (Translated Texts for Historians. 53.)
Liverpool, Liverpool University Press, 2009, 8°, xii-346 pp. ISBN 978-1-8463-1216-8. £19.95.
Includes selections from three papyri from Nessana in the Negev.
